scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node --project tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js serve --config webpack.config.dev.ts
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node --project tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js --config webpack.config.prod.ts
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node --project tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js --config webpack.config.dev.ts
scripts.build:progress: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node --project tsconfig-for-webpack-config.json node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js --config webpack.config.prod.ts --progress --color
